_sText:
IMPORTANT! READ THIS!

**UPDATE: Map version 2 Will be Availible soon.**

This is my VERY first map I ever created. It is a Zombie map. I would not really recomend it for anything else.
Since this is a zombie map,  (and my first map) it does not have a custom made nav file, so the bots can be a bit stupid sometimes.

The zombies cannot leave spawn area, you must make your way to them & open the door that lets the zombies out.

ABOUT THE MAP:
the map itself is a series of zombie maps to come. Basicly, the maps are different parts of a giant facility, this part will be the office part of the facility, where the people who have no idea whats going on below work.
The other parts will be a recycling facility, Labs, Chemical storage, and power.

I will also modify the maps to be playable in Hl2 single player mode.
these will be the map names:

Infiltration (lvl1)
Greenhouse (lvl2)
Nightmare (lvl3)
Under the Rug (lvl4)
Night light (lvl5)
Escape (lvl1 modifyed)

The best part of this map that I think is the secret. 

the secret is a safe room where no zombie can possibly get to you. (or unfortunatly you get to him) I call it the "Chill room"

Be prepared to get frustraited with getting to it without no clip mode on, cuz its VERY difficult!
